title: Writer Walks The Globe
teaser: From 2013 to 2020, National Geographic writer Paul Salopek is recreating the walk of our prehistoric ancestors out of African who migrated across the Middle East and Asia, before crossing into North America and points south. Paul spoke with Kathleen a year ago and joins her again for an update on his 7 year journey.
